评论详情: Tried different methods to wash, wrinkle remover, etc.  I love the fit, color and length.  Figured they would be good for travel, but you would have to find a three oz. Bottle of static remover to take in purse.

评论概述: The elastic in the back is uncomfortable and ill fitting
评论详情: This product is so elastic banded thickly in the back that it pinches, bunches, twists and digs in deep.  I bought a s/m and it was pinches in the back where the 2 inch band of elastic is sewn into the back.  So i returned for L/Xl. Still unflattering in the elastic back band so painful to look at and wear.  These pants having the elastic is cheap and ugly. The material is light and clingy.  Great idea, so poorly executed.

评论概述: Runs ridiculously small. Likely unwearable if you are above a certain height.
评论详情: The material was thin, which may have been a plus if I could get them around my hip bones, but it left them feeling rather cheaply made. The elastic is on only half of the circumference of the waist, leaving the pants completely unwearable if you are not thin and waifish. I got the L-XL size, as well, and I am really not that wide for my height. I cannot recommend these, though they may be good if you are the size of a gnat.

评论概述: These are okay - Not wild about the fabric
评论详情: I bought a pair of pants from a local shop that were nearly the exact same style as these, but those pants felt like a light weight cotton or high quality rayon. These pants are not like that. The fabric that these pants are made from feels like one of those thin silky lightweight shower curtains. The type of shower curtain that tries to fly away when the heat and steam from the shower starts to rise. I’m bummed because the price is the same as the pants I bought from the local boutique and I haven’t been able to find the same style since.

I am 5”5 and weigh 152.  Most of junk is in my chest not my bum and i usually wear a size medium 4-6 size pants.  I think the large would have been too large in the waist but might give a better flowing length, check other reviews but i think if you are over 5”5 i would size up either way.  I’m going to keep for the price.
